user.title: Connect to Contact Energy
user.description: Enter your Contact Energy account details. Note: Large date ranges (>30 days) will download data in the background to avoid blocking the interface. Optionally enable automatic daily restart to improve reliability and speed of historical data downloads.

data.usage_days: Fetch data for the past X days (1-365)
data.enable_auto_restart: Enable automatic restart (recommended for faster data downloads)
data.restart_time: Daily restart time (only used if auto-restart is enabled)

data_description.enable_auto_restart: Automatically restarts the integration daily to improve data download reliability and speed. This can help resolve temporary connection issues and ensure fresh data is retrieved.
data_description.restart_time: Time when the integration will restart daily (24-hour format). Choose a time when you're typically not using Home Assistant. The restart only affects this integration, not your entire Home Assistant system. This field is only used if auto-restart is enabled.

contract.title: Select a Contract
contract.description: Choose the electricity contract you want to track.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect. Please check your internet connection.
